ProfilesObject.description: A list of profiles and default settings to apply to each of them.

defaults.description: The default settings to apply to all profiles These settings may be overridden by each profile.

ProfileList.description: A list of profiles and the properties specific to each.

Profile.description: Properties specific to a unique profile.

autoImportModules.description: Names or paths of modules to import upon profile load.

localProfile.description: A PowerShell script file to dot source upon profile load.

longLoadTimeThreshold.description: The shortest length of time considered a long load time in seconds. By default, this is one second.

moduleLocations.description: Directories to add to the PowerShell module path.

showLongLoadTime.description: Whether long load times should be written to the host upon profile load.

useProfileSpecificHistory.description: Whether command history should be limited to the current profile.

writeProfileOnStart.description: Whether the name of the profile should be written to the host when the profile is imported.
